title: MatBot
description: Bot built via LLM and finetuning to solve matlab related issues and problems.

title: GenWeb
description: GenWeb is an AI-powered website builder built with Next.js, designed to streamline web development using modern tools like Clerk for authentication and Supabase for data storage.

title: NetSentinel
description: Real-time Network Traffic Monitoring and Threat Detection Platform built using React, FastAPI, Scapy, and modern data visualization tools.

title: MovieFlix
description: A full-stack movie ticket booking application that delivers a smooth cinema experience for users and an all-in-one management solution for theatre admins. From wishlist and seat selection to real-time booking confirmation and admin dashboards.

title: BlogsCorner
description: A modern, responsive blog platform built for friends to share inspirational content and society-related views. Create, discover, and engage with meaningful content in a beautifully designed interface.

title: SubtitleAI-Pro
description: An AI-powered web application that automatically generates English subtitles from YouTube videos using OpenAI's Whisper LLM.

title: Traffic-Flow-Simulation
description: A project for the course Partial Differential Equation that uses LWR and LSTM to estimate Traffic flow.

title: DDoS-Tool-WebApp
description: A powerful and ethical DDoS testing tool designed for security professionals and developers to simulate and analyze various types of DDoS attacks. This tool helps you understand how attacks work and how to defend against them.

title: Safar
description: Safar is a full-stack travel story application built using the MERN stack. It allows users to document, manage, and share their travel experiences through stories, complete with features for searching, filtering, and favoriting.

title: Differential-Equation-by-PINN
description: This project leverages Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) to solve Bessel's and Legendre's differential equations, commonly found in physics and engineering. By embedding differential equations directly into the neural network's training process, we achieve accurate, data-driven solutions.

title: Simple-File-Encryption
description: A modern, secure file encryption/decryption web application with a beautiful UI for protecting your sensitive files.

title: Port-Scanner
description: The Basic Port Scanner is a powerful web-based tool designed to scan ports on a target IP address. It provides detailed information about open ports, services, and additional data such as geolocation, operating system detection, and Shodan lookup results.

title: Rubiks-Cube-Simulator
description: A feature-rich, interactive 3D Rubik's Cube simulator built with React and Three.js. Made in 3.5 hrs.

title: Space-Quiz
description: An interactive, space-themed web quiz application that combines fun and education with real-time data. Made in 3 hrs and 21 mins.

title: Self-Driving-Car
description: A small self-driving car simulation which learns its movement through neural networks and improvises its motion autonomously.

title: Basic-Simplex-Solver
description: A web application for solving linear programming problems using the Simplex Method with step-by-step visualizations.

title: Password-Manager
description: A secure and user-friendly password manager built with Next.js, Clerk for authentication, and Supabase for database storage. This application allows users to securely store, manage, and retrieve their passwords with ease.

title: Password-Generator
description: Generate strong, secure, and unique passwords with ease. This web-based password generator offers real-time analysis, strength evaluation, and breach detection to ensure maximum security.

title: Ethical-Keylogger
description: An ethical keylogger designed for parental control and safety monitoring. It captures keystrokes, takes periodic screenshots, and sends activity reports via email.

title: Transcript Generator
description: A simple web app to transcribe audio files and recordings using OpenAI's Whisper.

title: Basic-Image-Classification
description: This project implements a K-Nearest Neighbors (KNN) classifier for hand-drawn figures and provides an interactive web-based interface for visualizing and evaluating its performance. The implementation includes parallelized evaluation of different k values.

title: FlaskPasswordStrengthCheck
description: A basic web application using Python Flask to check the strength of a password along with the estimated time it will take to crack that password.

title: LendingPool-Blockchain
description: A simple blockchain-based lending platform with dynamic interest rates built using Solidity smart contracts.

title: Basic-To-Do
description: Basic Task Manager for everyone with a clean and intuitive interface for managing daily tasks.

title: ApnaGhar
description: Basic Real-Estate website made to check hands over CSS with property listings and modern design.

title: Manzil
description: Basic web to test my pure CSS skills in a day with modern layouts and responsive design.

title: WebScanner
description: A full-stack web application to scan and detect security vulnerabilities in websites and networks.

title: PDF-GPT
description: PDF-GPT is a private, local-first chatbot that lets you upload PDF documents, extract content into vector embeddings, and ask questions about the documents using an LLM backend (powered by Ollama).

title: Neuro-Trade-via-PINNs
description: Using SDE along with PINNs to formulate the Indian Equity prices for last 10 years with advanced financial modeling.

title: Smart-Notes
description: Smart Notes Saver is a powerful Chrome extension that lets you save, categorize, and summarize text snippets from any webpage with Dark Mode Toggle and download functionality.

title: Basic-Chrome-Extension
description: A custom new tab Chrome extension that displays an analog clock, a digital clock with date, and motivational quotes to keep you inspired while studying or working.

title: Auto-Dark-Mode
description: A Chrome extension that applies dark mode to any website for a better browsing experience.

title: Rajm012
description: Portfolio Website for me.
